statements: DELETE FROM face_recognition WHERE full_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM face_recognition WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM face_recognition WHERE full_name = 'Alice' AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM face_recognition WHERE gender = 'Female' AND known_face = false;
DELETE FROM known_faces WHERE person_id IN (1, 2) AND face_id NOT IN (5, 8);
DELETE FROM KnownFaces WHERE name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM Interactions WHERE person_id = 3 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
